channel.title: ** A New Type Of Game ----- FireRune---- New Name: Mors Orbis
channel.description:
[img]http://morsorbis.comuf.com/img/logo.png[/img]
[size=14pt][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/142byxi.png[/img]Mors Orbis Information[/size] ------------------- Mors Orbis - once known as FireRune, is a text based game that is currently under development, our very small staff of under 15 people are currently trying to create a text-based game off of Runescape, so far we have got the following! ------------------- [size=14pt]Mors Orbis Update Log[/size] -------------------
[code] January 7, 2011 - Started Coding the 'Pking' FunctionS January 7, 2011 - Profile Page's January 7, 2011 - Member List January 5, 2011 - Total of 20 Items in the Game January 5, 2011 - Added 2 More Items into the Game! January 5, 2011 - 3 Bank slots not (was 2) January 4/5, 2011 - New style and loaded all of the old contents into it January 3, 2011 - Deposit (bank) 100% (fixing withdraw) January 3, 2011 - Added 10 Items Into the Game :D (planning on over 1000) January 3, 2011 - Started Bank Functions! January 3, 2011 - Added jQuery Sponser toggle January 3, 2011 - Added Wielding (1 item inventory atm :( ) January 3, 2011 - Started jQuery Side Bar - 70% Done January 3, 2011 - 30% Finished with the new mySQL :D January 2, 2011 - Re-Doing mySQL from scratch (to make it a lot better) January 2, 2011 - Created server status' (php senses when server is up or down) January 2, 2011 - Name Change/Website Change - Pics Up Soon! January 2, 2011 - Made Register/Signin/Logout PHP Script (Again for the new site) January 2, 2011 - Started on sidebar interface. (jQuery) January 2, 2011 - Created 'Credits' page
[/code]
[size=14pt]Mors Orbis Pictures![/size]
**STILL ADDING PICTURES!**
**PLEASE NOTE WE HAVE A NEW WEBSITE STYLE! PICS SOON
Onced Logged In
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/20gl9xv.png[/img]
Side Bar (Looks like theres 2 but, thats cuz my mouse was on it my bad) - Also wielding works with all items in correct places [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2149nhd.png[/img]
See The Site In Action => Link Will not Be Posted Until i get permission :D sorryyy
Feedback is Welcomed :D (And what You Would like to see)

item.title: ** A New Type Of Game ----- FireRune---- New Name: Mors Orbis
item.dc:creator: @ModFireHeart ModFireHeart
item.description:
@ModFireHeart wrote:

Thanks and I hope to finish Pking methods by Jan 20 it takes time to make it so that no one cane find a way to trick the system, and thanks qoodscape for that suggestion I did put the old models (Cept whip) I will take more suggestions and possibly use if I agree with it!

Read full topic
item.source: ** A New Type Of Game ----- FireRune---- New Name: Mors Orbis

item.title: ** A New Type Of Game ----- FireRune---- New Name: Mors Orbis
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“ModFireHeart, post:25, topic:375889”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=471822.msg3459598#msg3459598 date=1294356370]
basically like this one pokemon game online my brother plays, will combat you click “attack” and then you attack, and then they click “attack” and it keeps going over and over
[/quote]

Actually, PKing is my next step and i promise you it wont go on forever, im going to have it so once you kill that person you cannot kill them for another 30 minutes, and you wont press attack 5,000 times you’ll go on the users profile page and press attack them, ONCE - i will write many functions to ensure that, and also i will write functions that the better ‘bonus’ you have (Currently only have attack bonus) the better hits will calculate (will add defense for some resistance against there attack)[/quote]
hmm, this could turn out awesome

Read full topic

item.title: ** A New Type Of Game ----- FireRune---- New Name: Mors Orbis
item.dc:creator: @ModFireHeart ModFireHeart
item.description:
@ModFireHeart wrote:

kingman002:

basically like this one pokemon game online my brother plays, will combat you click “attack” and then you attack, and then they click “attack” and it keeps going over and over

Actually, PKing is my next step and i promise you it wont go on forever, im going to have it so once you kill that person you cannot kill them for another 30 minutes, and you wont press attack 5,000 times you’ll go on the users profile page and press attack them, ONCE - i will write many functions to ensure that, and also i will write functions that the better ‘bonus’ you have (Currently only have attack bonus) the better hits will calculate (will add defense for some resistance against there attack)

Read full topic

Whats Illegal about this? i do not use the runescape client (which is illegal), the idea is based off runescape with the items, but the items arent called sayy abysal whip - its just called whip so whats so illegal about that? besides before entering you have to agree to TOS

item.title: ** A New Type Of Game ----- FireRune---- New Name: Mors Orbis
item.dc:creator: @qoodscape qoodscape
item.description:
@qoodscape wrote:

[quote="`Pandemonium, post:10, topic:375889"]This is overall terrible. The idea is horrid, the content has no flow or clear planned layout, there is no color scheme, you ripped images and colors from Facebook, and it has no point. Why exactly would someone play a text-based game like this over a 3D program? You have to take into consideration a possible audience.

Badly prepared and I guess I wish you luck but your lack of preparation and thought put into the application will probably be its doom.[/quote]

Actually it says in his thread it’s mainly an iPod webapp so people can use on the go (unlike Runescape itself) so it can possibly have an audience if he publicizes it correctly. Also he’s redoing the temple
So it will have some kind of style to it. (as it says in article)

  • to ModFireHeart
    Glad to hear you learned jQuery, it will make the site that much better can’t wait to see what you’ve done! Also if you need graphic ideas I usto do CSS and HTML back In the day. Ps I’d play this

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ModFireHeart ModFireHeart
item.description:
@ModFireHeart wrote:

Muroth:

Cross browser support; mysql injections; php exploits; just be prepared. best of luck.

Exactly What im doing Thanks im gonna post what the Newest site looks like (Definatly Keeping this Template now i just have to redo most of my PHP and MYSQL codes but This site has jQuery (which i made myself because i learned jQuery 2 Days ago and i really like what you can do with it :P)

Read full topic

item.title: ** A New Type Of Game ----- FireRune---- New Name: Mors Orbis
item.dc:creator: @_Pandemonium `Pandemonium
item.description:
@_Pandemonium wrote:

This is overall terrible. The idea is horrid, the content has no flow or clear planned layout, there is no color scheme, you ripped images and colors from Facebook, and it has no point. Why exactly would someone play a text-based game like this over a 3D program? You have to take into consideration a possible audience.

Badly prepared and I guess I wish you luck but your lack of preparation and thought put into the application will probably be its doom.

Read full topic
